page.title: 12MARWOOD S. THE CHURCH HALL
page.content: Our church hall used to be a school.Now it is used for lots of parish activities.It belongs to the church but it can be hired out. The playgroup uses the hall the most,two days a week during term time. This is for children from 3_5years.There is also a Mum and Toddlers group which combine with a keep fit class. At the weekends and bank holidays the church members help their funds by making cream teas for visitors to Marwood Gardens. The civil defence group hold meetings there and the Adventureres and Teenagers have parties and fund raising events there. There is a flower and vegetable show held there in July or August. The sports and social committee run whist drives discos and parties.
